channel.title: CVE Feed for Dassault Systèmes -- 3DEXPERIENCE

item.title: CVE-2023-1996|2024-08-02T06:05:27.108Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- 3dexperience
item.description: A reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2018x through Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2023x allows an attacker to execute arbitrary script code.
